stimulusHtml: Which of the following will happen if the government raises both taxes and spending by $100 million and the marginal propensity to consume is 0.8?
choicesHtml: Aggregate demand will decrease, and real GDP will decrease by a maximum of $500.
Aggregate demand will decrease, and real GDP will decrease by a maximum of $400.
Aggregate demand will increase, and real GDP will increase by a maximum of $100.
Aggregate demand will increase, and real GDP will increase by a maximum of $400.
Aggregate demand will increase, and real GDP will increase by a maximum of $500.
